definition: to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: If it's pushed right up against the front of the shoe, they're too small.
sentences.chinese: 如果它刚好在鞋头，那这双些就太小了。

sentences.english: My line hadcaught on a small chip in the lip.
sentences.chinese: 我的绳子刚好挂住了这只瓷盘边上的一个小缺口。

sentences.english: North and south, directly go to photography floor to find m blue, just small stone.
sentences.chinese: 南北直接去摄影楼找米蓝了，刚好碰到小石头。

sentences.english: Letting tax cheats run wild doesn’t exactly serve the cause of deficit reduction.
sentences.chinese: 让骗税泛滥与削减赤字的努力作用刚好相反。

sentences.english: The road was just enough for two vehicles to pass.
sentences.chinese: 这条路的宽度刚好能让两辆车开过。

sentences.english: Place your hands on your hips and lower your butt until it's just above the seat.
sentences.chinese: 双手放在臀部，慢慢下蹲到臀部刚好在椅子上方。

sentences.english: When pulled forward, tip of ear should just cover the eye.
sentences.chinese: 如果向前拉，耳尖刚好盖住眼睛。

sentences.english: One was lost right here in Bombay.
sentences.chinese: 其中一个，刚好是在这儿孟买丢的。

sentences.english: It so happens I’ve done this for two households so far this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年我刚好为两个亲眷做过类似的事情。

sentences.english: PC 6 is exactly opposite, on the inner forearm between the two tendons.
sentences.chinese: 筹委会6刚好相反筋，对两者之间的内在前臂。

sentences.english: That puts the company right on the fuzzy no man's land between value and growth.
sentences.chinese: 这就使谷歌刚好落在价值股与成长股的分界线上。

sentences.english: The flagon contains precisely eight cups of wine.
sentences.chinese: 它就是一壶酒刚好倒满八只酒杯。

sentences.english: A little boat is now under the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 现在刚好有只船在桥底下。

sentences.english: Fang Qun has just met Dean, who is Canadian.
sentences.chinese: 方群刚好遇上迪安，他是加拿大人。

sentences.english: It is thinnest at the top; this thin area is located just below the spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 其最薄处为顶端部分，刚好位于脊髓之下。

sentences.english: And this brings us to a very famous contribution of Gilbert ryle.
sentences.chinese: 吉尔伯特的著名贡献刚好说明了这一论点。

definition: just (in time)/just right/just enough/to happen to/to chance to/by chance/it just so happens that
as it turns out/by lucky coincidence/(of number, time, size etc) just right
too bad/unfortunately/as luck would have it
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
to keep up with/to catch up with/to overtake/to chance upon/in time for
almost/nearly/more or less/about the same/good enough/not bad
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
